nodes.text: Neebuk Garbos was a male Sullustan, who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Garbos joined the Syndicate and worked as a bodyguard for its leader, Alina Impeveri, at the Syndicate's headquarters in the Ishkik caverns, on the planet Cularin. When a group of Tarasin discovered that the caverns were being used by the Syndicate, Garbos and Bhassi Kloor, Impeveri's other bodyguard, pursued and killed all but one of the Tarasin.
A short time later, Kloor and Garbos fought against the Heroes of Cularin in the Ishkik caverns, but were defeated.
